SEARCH
模块 Fianalproject
程序包 application

类 RobotArena

java.lang.Object
application.RobotArena
public class RobotArena extends Object
The RobotArena class represents a simulation environment for managing and controlling multiple robots. It maintains a grid of specified dimensions, a list of robots, and a list of obstacles within the arena. The class provides methods to add robots, move them, detect collisions, and reset their states.
版本:
1.0
作者:
[SHEN FANGJIE]

  • 构造器详细资料

    • RobotArena

      public RobotArena(int sizeX, int sizeY)
      Constructs a new RobotArena object with specified dimensions.
      参数:
      sizeX - the width of the arena grid
      sizeY - the height of the arena grid

  • 方法详细资料

    • addRobot

      public void addRobot(Robot robot)
      Adds a robot to the arena if its initial position is within the bounds of the grid.
      参数:
      robot - the robot to be added
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the robot's initial position is out of bounds

    • addRandomRobots

      public void addRandomRobots(int count)
      Adds a specified number of random robots to the arena. Each robot's type is chosen randomly from the available types.
      参数:
      count - the number of robots to add

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all robots and obstacles from the arena.

    • resetRobots

      public void resetRobots()
      Resets the state of all robots in the arena.

    • moveRobots

      public void moveRobots()
      Moves all robots in the arena, handling obstacle and robot-robot collisions.

    • isCollidingWithObstacle

      private boolean isCollidingWithObstacle(Robot robot)
      Checks if a robot is colliding with any obstacle in the arena.
      参数:
      robot - the robot to check for collision
      返回:
      true if the robot is colliding with an obstacle, false otherwise

    • detectCollisions

      private void detectCollisions()
      Detects and handles collisions between robots. Specifically, it checks for collisions between AdvancedRobots and BasicRobots, where AdvancedRobots can destroy BasicRobots upon collision.

    • updateView

      private void updateView()
      Updates the view by invoking the provided callback function.

    • getRobots

      public List<Robot> getRobots()
      Gets the list of robots in the arena.
      返回:
      the list of robots

    • getObstacles

      public List<Obstacle> getObstacles()
      Gets the list of obstacles in the arena.
      返回:
      the list of obstacles

    • getSizeX

      public int getSizeX()
      Gets the width of the arena grid.
      返回:
      the width of the arena grid

    • getSizeY

      public int getSizeY()
      Gets the height of the arena grid.
      返回:
      the height of the arena grid

    • setOnUpdate

      public void setOnUpdate(Runnable callback)
      Sets the callback function to be invoked when the arena state changes.
      参数:
      callback - the callback function

    • addObstacle

      public void addObstacle(Obstacle obstacle)
      Adds an obstacle to the arena if its position is within the bounds of the grid.
      参数:
      obstacle - the obstacle to be added
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the obstacle's position is out of bounds
